Text: RE FW Assignment of transaction no Cc number is Just to clarify are we all putting the documents together for ourselves and faxing execution pages with originals to follow Or am I to wait to receive an original before executing and faxing Michelle Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday March AM To Cc Subject Re FW Assignment of transaction no Michael I have reviewed the assignment documennt I intend to make two changes which I hope you make in the copies that the other parties are signing These being that the Assignment be effective as of April and the left over reference to Alberta be deleted from Enron North America Corps address I will attach Transaction No to the Assignment Document and have it executed by Enron If you will provide me with the fax numbers for each party I will fax to these numbers My fax number is Kleiner Michael To MichaelKleine cc Subject FW Assignment of transaction no PM Original Message From Kleiner Michael Sent Wednesday March PM To Houghton Brian Subject Assignment of transaction no Everyone Attached is a revised assignment agreement which we hope you will find satisfactory Our hope is to have this agreement signed Thursday Michelles fax and counterpart execution clause should facilitate execution Let me know if you expect any problems with execution Gulf Canada Resources Limited per Michael P Kleiner Law Department Enron contract assignmentdoc See attached file Enron contract assignmentdoc

RE FW Assignment of transaction no Cc number is Just to clarify are we all putting the documents together for ourselves and faxing execution pages with originals to follow Or am I to wait to receive an original before executing and faxing Michelle Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday March AM To Cc Subject Re FW Assignment of transaction no Michael I have reviewed the assignment documennt I intend to make two changes which I hope you make in the copies that the other parties are signing These being that the Assignment be effective as of April and the left over reference to Alberta be deleted from Enron North America Corps address I will attach Transaction No to the Assignment Document and have it executed by Enron If you will provide me with the fax numbers for each party I will fax to these numbers My fax number is Kleiner Michael To MichaelKleine cc Subject FW Assignment of transaction no PM Original Message From Kleiner Michael Sent Wednesday March PM To Houghton Brian Subject Assignment of transaction no Everyone Attached is a revised assignment agreement which we hope you will find satisfactory Our hope is to have this agreement signed Thursday Michelles fax and counterpart execution clause should facilitate execution Let me know if you expect any problems with execution Gulf Canada Resources Limited per Michael P Kleiner Law Department Enron contract assignmentdoc See attached file Enron contract assignmentdoc
